release.change: New: Changelog dialog added
New: Version number added to the bottom of main UI
Changed: Main UI and other items looks much nicer now
Changed: Moved whitelist apps to Settings
Changed: 'Enable Doze on unsupported device' option only shows up if Doze is actually disabled by the OEM on your device
Fixed: Battery percentage shows as empty on some devices
Fixed: Doze usage stats are not chronological
Fixed: Service starts on boot even when it's not enabled
New: You can now let motion sensors stay active for all apps when Doze mode is active
New: Disable Doze on charging: You can now disable Doze mode when the device is charging. This is turned on by default
New: You can now see at what times the device has entered/exited Doze mode and the battery percentage at that time
Changed: ForceDoze will now ask for confirmation when resetting
Fixed: Reset ForceDoze does not disable service
Fixed: Sensors not enabling properly after screen on
New: Whitelist app from sensorservice
New: Reset ForceDoze
Changed: Language clarity
Fixed: Auto-rotate disabled on some devices
Fixed: Some menu options disabled until app restart
New: Whitelist apps: You can now whitelist specific apps so they do not get suspended or disabled while Doze is active
New: Force Enable Doze: On some devices, Doze mode is disabled by the OEM, you can now enable Doze on such devices (experimental)
Changed: Disable Doze feature has been removed because it was not important
Changed: Non-root workaround dialog now shows a Share option so you can share the ADB command to Pushbullet, etc
Fixed: Some bugs
New: No-root mode
First release
